Document.Title: SQL Server 2005 t-SQL: The Use of the nodes() Method for SQL Types; Converting XML Data into SQL Types

Content:
DECLARE @xml xml

SET @xml = '
    <Root>
        <Item>one</Item>
        <Item>two</Item>
        <Item>three</Item>
        <Item>four</Item>
        <Item>five</Item>
    </Root>
'

SELECT
    Temp.Items.value('.','varchar(16)') AS [Items]
FROM
    @xml.nodes('//Item') AS Temp(Items)

/*
    For general information, see
    “Introduction to XQuery in SQL Server 2005”
    http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms345122.aspx
*/
